name: Recipe: Fragrant Mashed Potatoes
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Fragrant Mashed Potatoes.

value.name: Potato
value.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

value.name: Cream
value.desc: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.

value.name: Pepper
value.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

value.name: Fragrant Mashed Potatoes
value.desc: Seasoned mashed potatoes. The potatoes were thoroughly mashed before a sauce was drizzled over them. The mouthfeel is soft and smooth and it has a rich, multi-layered flavor profile. A satisfying choice for a hungry stomach, whether as a side or as a main dish.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from the Outland Gastronomy Login Event from the Recipe Collection: Exotic Gourmet (Only available during March 17, 2021 - April 01, 2021)</color>
